definition: to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous

sentences.english: Thus, this study has explored and generalized the mechanism of the cause of meaning-formation in various Chinese patterns.
sentences.chinese: 從中可以推衍出漢語各種構式意義成因的機理。

sentences.english: A simpler derivation of the general form of the regularized solution is also obtained.
sentences.chinese: 並簡單的說明一下正規化通式運算的推衍。

sentences.english: Chapter two deducts the whole logic system of the Ho-shang Kung Commentaries on the Lao Tzu.
sentences.chinese: 第二章展開《河上公注》思想體系的邏輯推衍全過程。

sentences.english: Nationalism and civil rights derived ideas, especially the anti-Manchu trick.
sentences.chinese: 民族主義與民權思想的推衍，尤招滿族之忌。

sentences.english: Imperial palace chart in Lo Shu also shows the evolution of such concept.
sentences.chinese: 而《洛書》的九宮圖，也是這種三才觀的推衍。

definition: to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
